alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Guadalupe; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 12:24PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Caldwell, southeastern Hays and northeastern Guadalupe Counties through 115 PM CDT... At 1224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fentress, or 8 miles northwest of Luling, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Marcos, Seguin, Lockhart, Martindale, Kingsbury, Staples, Fentress, Stairtown, San Marcos Regional Airport, Maxwell, Reedville and Redwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
